relatedAITools.heading: Related AI Tools

items.question: What types of image formats are supported for text extraction?
items.answer: We support various formats including JPG, PNG, and PDF. For optimal results, images should be clear and high-resolution.

items.question: How accurate is the text extraction process?
items.answer: Our AI technology is designed for high accuracy, typically achieving over 95% correct text extraction under optimal conditions.

items.question: Is the extracted text editable?
items.answer: Yes! The extracted text can be downloaded in editable formats such as TXT or DOCX for easy modification.

items.question: Can the tool handle handwritten text?
items.answer: Yes, our High Precision Extraction model is specifically designed to recognize and extract handwritten text effectively.

items.question: How is user data handled during the extraction process?
items.answer: We prioritize data security. All images are processed securely, and user data is not stored once extraction is complete.

items.question: Is there a limit to how many images I can process at once?
items.answer: No limit! You can process multiple images simultaneously, making it efficient for large projects.

items.question: What happens if the extraction fails?
items.answer: In the unlikely event of a failure, you will receive a detailed error report with possible reasons and recommendations for improvement.

items.question: Can I use the extracted text for commercial purposes?
items.answer: Absolutely! All extracted text comes with full rights for commercial use, no additional fees involved.

items.question: What kind of support is available if I need help?
items.answer: We offer comprehensive support through documentation, tutorials, and customer service via email and chat.

items.question: Are there any subscription fees or hidden costs?
items.answer: No, WaveSpeed operates on a pay-as-you-go model with clear pricing based on the volume of text extracted.
